column2: an A.M. Eatery////My actual food took about 10-15 minutes to arrive
column3: and here's the kicker. When I got my food
column4: every thing was COLD!!! The egg -cold
column5: the gravy on the pot pie -cold
column10: double hockey sticks happened between me placing my order and them bringing it to me a few minutes later?!?! Was it just sitting on a counter in the back for an extended period of time waiting to be picked up?!?!
